resources.string: "Wait...it's not over though! The whole purpose of the algorithm is to customize the runtime correctly. Imagine if the range increases from 1-15 to 1-100. The compiler will check each number to determine whether it is divisible by 3 or 5. It would then run through the numbers again to check if the numbers are divisible by 3 and 5. The code would essentially have to run through each number in the array twice"
